description: T46 & T47 False Acacia side of No 71 - Crown reduce by 3m to previous reduction points as one treeT48 Maple outside No 72 - Remove broken branchT49 Maple outside No 83 - Crown lift by 0.5mT57 Gleditsia on corner by garages to rear - Prune back to give 2m clearanceT58 Gleditsia on corner by garages to rear - Prune back to give 2m clearanceT34 Yew by pool entrance - Reduce laterally by 1.5m towards adjacent property and 1.5m towards pool to leave a balanced appearance but to mitigate encroachmentT25 Silver Birch opposite the above on opposing side of road - Crown lift by 2m over roadT27 Winter Flowering Cherry on lawn adjacent to above - Reduce laterally by 1.5m towards flatsGolden Macrocarpa at end of road adjacent to No 66 overhanging - Reduce laterally back over roadway by 2mT18 & T29 False Acacia x 2 by closed courtyard entrance - Prune back from houses/flats to give 1.5-2m clearanceT7-T12 London Plane x 5 by entrance to estate - Repollard in winter 2015/2016T13-T16 & T 19 Maple x 6 by entrance to estate - Repollard in winter 2015/2016 Rear of Flats 1,3,5 Small Judas Tree by steps - Remove stake and lightly reduceT1 London Plane opposite Holm Oak hanging over Strawberry Vale - Crown lift by 2mT62 & T63 Katsura x 2 by pond - Crown reduce by 1.5-2m to previous reduction points
